meanings.definition: To place (cremated remains) in an urn.
meanings.sent1: They will inurn the ashes of their beloved pet in a beautiful urn.
meanings.sent2: After the cremation, the family decided to inurn the ashes in a small urn.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to inurn its toy mouse in the empty flower pot.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the sky seemed to inurn the city in a golden glow.
meanings.sent5: The gentle waves of the ocean inurned the footprints in the sand.

meanings.definition: To inter (cremated remains) in an urn.
meanings.sent1: The family will inurn the ashes of their loved one in the family plot.
meanings.sent2: The cemetery allowed them to inurn the ashes of their relative in a special urn.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tried to inurn its acorn in the hole of the tree.
meanings.sent4: The darkness seemed to inurn the forest in a cloak of mystery.
meanings.sent5: The snowfall inurned the town in a blanket of white.
